channel.title: ATX on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ATX on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Reasons I Know My Heart is in Austin, Texas
item.description: I travel a lot for work. As anyone who travels for work will know, people always say, “You get to travel a lot? That must be nice!” And it is nice. It’s fun to see all the different nooks and crannies of the United States, and I love meeting people from all the different walks of life I do.
